price: Dan orang-orang yang mengambil pelindung-pelindung selain-Nya, Allah mengawasi (perbuatan) mereka; adapun engkau (Muhammad) bukanlah orang yang diserahi mengawasi mereka.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهُ حَفِيظٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيۡهِم بِوَكِيلٖ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna ittakhadhū min dūnihi awliyāa al-lahu ḥafīẓun ʿalayhim wamā anta ʿalayhim biwakīlin
